title: The Reborn Investment Tycoon - Novel Updates
tags: College/University   Economics   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Second Chance   Shameless Protagonist   Time Travel
author: 不谷
description:
Now that I am reborn, I will be as rich as Croesus!

No wait, I have to find my wife first.

At this point in time, My wife still hasn’t fallen in love with that scum yet, So I had better move quickly!

I can’t let that cheap scumbag ruin her …>
